overview: Tiensri was disappointed with love so she has a perception that no man is honest to her. However, after she has a car accident since Tiwa crashes a car into her car; her perception about man starts to change again because Tiwa take cares of her very well. The reason behind his actions is Tiwa likes her. Unfortunately, Tiensri learns that Tiwa is her ex-boyfriend’s brother-in-law and that makes Tiwa’s depressed and wants to leave where she lives. How does their love end up? Can Tiwa make Tiensri realize his love?
title: Raeng Tien
